column1: Uchi////I ordered tasting menu of 6 courses after waiter strongly recommended it. I specifically asked waiter if tasting menu is adequate in amount for two people. He's confident we wouldn't be hungry. Tasting menu includes 2 cold appetizer dishes
column4: and one dessert. All are pretty tiny. Each dish is
column6: overspiced. Not like an authentic Japanese good. If you look to party
column7: this is a right place. If you hope to taste a real Japanese food
